alert.note: Alert for Bourbon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 9:36PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bourbon and northern Vernon Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 936 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fulton to near Fort Scott to near Uniontown. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nevada... Fort Scott... Marmaton... Bronson... Uniontown... Walker... Schell City... Fulton... Redfield... Richards... Mapleton... Deerfield... Metz... Harwood... Stotesbury... Horton... Harding... Petersburg... Hammond... Devon... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 90 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
